text:
I am a tax professional, how does Path to Pennie work for me?
          
        
The Path to Pennie program was createdtoeasilyconnect uninsured tax filers withhealth insuranceoffered throughPennie.
When someone files their Pennsylvania tax return, they may complete a form called
REV-1882
, electing to receive information about enrolling in health and dental coverage available through Pennie, as well as financial assistance to help lower the costs.
